attributes.name: visible
attributes.title: Visible
attributes.description: Sets whether the toolbar is visible or not

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.title: Anchor ID
attributes.description: The HTML ID of the element the toolbar is positioned relative to

attributes.name: delay
attributes.title: Delay
attributes.description: The delay in milliseconds before a toolbar is shown after a hover event

attributes.name: position
attributes.title: Position
attributes.description: Controls the placement of the toolbar relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'
